mulinma mathaka thiyaganna api me igena ganna yanne sangitha bhandayak.igena ganna bhandayata wagema igena ganna yana shrasthrayata loku gaurawayak oyalage hithe thiyenna oone.anith eka thamayi me sandaha oyala yamkisi kalayak kapa karanna wenawa.issara wage neweyi dan minissu nidahas na.wada kotiyayi.namuth hariyata kalaya kalamanakaranaya karagaththoth eeka loku prashnayak neweyi.anika aasawa thiyenawanam kalaya gana hithennewath na.me adahas tikath oluwe thiyagena api mathrukawata bahimu.

krushikarmika katayuthu sandaha bhawitha karana rasayanika pohora saha krushi rasayana drawya welandapole hingawima saha mila ihala yama hethuwen thaman dadi asiruthawayakata pathwa athi bawata gowin dinen dina chodana karanawa.polonnaruwa disthrikkayata ayath alahara gowijanapadaye pihiti aththanakadawala yaya 20 saha 28 gowi sanwidhana yatathe mewara yala kannaya sandaha kumbauru akkara 278 kata aasanna pramanayaka wi waga kara thibenawa.ema wagawan sandaha yuriya pohora methek nolabimen gowin dadi asiruthawayakata pathwa sitinawa.owun pawasanne rasayanika pohora aanayanaya nathara kirimata rajaya thiranaya kala yuththe gowin kabanika pohora sandaha huru kirimen anathuruwa bawayi.me athara, rajanganaya pradeshaye gowinta krushi rasayanika pohora labadimata ada ema pradeshaye krushikarma niladharin katayuthu kala.kese wethath, krushi rasayana pohora labadima sandaha girithale gowijana sewa karyalayata paminena lesata ema pradeshaye gowinta danuwath kala da ada perawaruwe ema gowijana sewa karyalaya wiwrutha kara nothibima nisa gowin pathwuye dadi apahasuthawakatayi.
